prompts: Create a cute, small Pokemon that has a round body and soft, fluffy fur.
Imagine a Pokemon with blue and gray colors that resembles a small mammal.
Design a Pokemon that burrows underground and has a protective shell on its back.
Generate a Pokemon that thrives in desert environments and has a playful personality.
Show me a Pokemon that is known for its agility and swift movements in battle.
Make a Pokemon that can curl into a ball and roll away to escape danger.
Give me an ice-type Pokemon that has a unique blend of blue and gray shades.
